text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, on goh, ki mast hasted, girdi namoz magarded, to ʙidoned, ki cī megūed. Va niz dar holi çanoʙat, to ƣusl kuned, magar on ki rohguzar ʙoşed. Va agar ʙemor jo dar safar ʙuded, jo az makoni qazoi hocat ʙozgaştaed, jo ʙo zanon çimo' kardaed va oʙ najofted, ʙo xoki pok tajammum kuned va ruju dasthojatonro ʙo on xok mash kuned. Alʙatta Xudo avfkunanda va omurzanda ast
